snippet: The Federal Reserve’s brighter economic outlook and recent stock market strength drove investors away from government debt.
abstract: Major stock averages end essentially flat, as investors move away from government debt.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve’s brighter economic outlook and recent stock market strength drove investors away from government debt.

headline.seo: Shares End Fairly Flat as S.&P. 500 Breaks Its Streak
headline.main: Shares End Mostly Flat as the S.&P. Breaks Its Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: Shares End Mostly Flat as the S.&P. Breaks Its Winning Streak
